channel.title: [317]InfoScape 317-Perfect For New Coders[With some 459 Items]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://puu.sh/1SJPs[/img][size=24pt]INFOSCAPE 317[/size][center] [center]Hello people of Moparscape, I decided to release this because I'm moving onto a project of much larger scale, if you enjoyed this release, feel free to comment :) .[/center]
[center](I realize that some of these screenshots may look a bit odd,the pictures do not do this source justice)[/center]
Let's start off with Media: [img]http://puu.sh/1SWo9[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/1SWFm[/img] Working Dragon Claws
[img]http://puu.sh/1SWKd[/img] Working Zamorak God-Sword
[img]http://puu.sh/1SWJ7[/img] Working Bandos God-Sword
[img]http://puu.sh/1SWMo[/img] Working Saradomin God-Sword
[img]http://puu.sh/1SWOG[/img] Working Armadyl God-Sword
[img]http://puu.sh/1SWRA[/img] Dice Command
Features: Mostly Blank Source, aside from the necessities. All spirit shields Commands(Listed In Text Document In Source) Easy To Follow Guide(Listed In Text Document In Source) Combat is flawed, although easily fixable(Didn't have time to fix :s, sorry) Weapons are perfectly calibrated(aside from Vesta's LongSword, was playing around with stats on it :P ) All Armour is calibrated EASY TO CODE
Credits: 40% To Imananub for allowing me to use his original base 50% To me for fixing up the source, and making it user-friendly. 10% To the Moparscape Community without whom none of this would be possible
DOWNLOAD-------> http://up.ht/TCPije
Use any client that can load 459 cache Virus scan it if you'd like, I'm too lazy :P

item.title: [317]InfoScape 317-Perfect For New Coders[With some 459 Items]
item.dc:creator: @xxInfamousxx xxInfamousxx
item.description:
@xxInfamousxx wrote:

[center][size=24pt]INFOSCAPE 317[/size][center]
[center]Hello people of Moparscape, I decided to release this because I’m moving onto a project of much larger scale, if you enjoyed this release, feel free to comment .[/center]

[center](I realize that some of these screenshots may look a bit odd,the pictures do not do this source justice)[/center]

Let’s start off with Media:


Working Dragon Claws


Working Zamorak God-Sword


Working Bandos God-Sword


Working Saradomin God-Sword


Working Armadyl God-Sword


Dice Command

Features:
Mostly Blank Source, aside from the necessities.
All spirit shields
Commands(Listed In Text Document In Source)
Easy To Follow Guide(Listed In Text Document In Source)
Combat is flawed, although easily fixable(Didn’t have time to fix :s, sorry)
Weapons are perfectly calibrated(aside from Vesta’s LongSword, was playing around with stats on it )
All Armour is calibrated
EASY TO CODE

Credits:
40% To Imananub for allowing me to use his original base
50% To me for fixing up the source, and making it user-friendly.
10% To the Moparscape Community without whom none of this would be possible

DOWNLOAD-------> http://up.ht/TCPije

Use any client that can load 459 cache
Virus scan it if you’d like, I’m too lazy

Read full topic
